lines: 1. 'Kero Yes'Arwete Igoro,Gokwera abanyabibe;'S'amabera taetaneti'Abake buna nche.
2. Akabarigi' abanene,As'are kworokereria;Bakamoretera abana,Abake buna nche.
3. 'Monene tabaseretie,Nigo abatigete as'are;Tatigete ond'airane,Omoke buna nche.
4. Akarw'obogima bwaye,'Batorie korw'amakweri;Nomobui bw'ogotoria,Abake buna nche.
5. Abana momwanche bono,Mokore ogwancha kwaye;Momosabe, momobake,Abana buna nche.
